1、This is a helper tool for Taobao shopping when you're not in China.
2、You can buy anything from taobao.com or tmall.com, that we can ship the goods to you.
3、You can pay US dollar but CNY ,it is simple for you.
4、You can buy something from different taobao shop that we can package all the goods and send you only one bag, you can save some money.
